verses.text: It \w is|strong="H1732"\w* right \w for|strong="H1732"\w* you, O God, \w to|strong="H1732"\w* \w have|strong="H1732"\w* praise \w in|strong="H1732"\w* Zion: \w to|strong="H1732"\w* you let \w the|strong="H1732"\w* offering \w be|strong="H1732"\w* made.
\w To|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H6726"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* hearer \w of|strong="H0430"\w* prayer, let \w the|strong="H0430"\w* words \w of|strong="H0430"\w* all flesh come.

Evils \w have|strong="H3605"\w* overcome \w us|strong="H0935"\w*: \w but|strong="H8085"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* sins, \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w take|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0935"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w*.

Happy \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* man \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* selection, \w to|strong="H1697"\w* whom \w you|strong="H0859"\w* give \w a|strong="H4480"\w* resting-place \w in|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* house; \w we|strong="H1697"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* full \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* good \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H4480"\w* holy place.

\w You|strong="H7126"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* give us \w an|strong="H7126"\w* answer \w in|strong="H1004"\w* righteousness \w by|strong="H7126"\w* great acts \w of|strong="H1004"\w* power, \w O|strong="H1004"\w* God \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w our|strong="H0977"\w* salvation; \w you|strong="H7126"\w* who \w are|strong="H0835"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* hope \w of|strong="H1004"\w* all \w the|strong="H7126"\w* ends \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* far-off lands \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7126"\w* sea;

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* strength \w the|strong="H3605"\w* mountains \w are|strong="H0776"\w* fixed; \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* robed \w with|strong="H0430"\w* power:

Who \w makes|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* loud voice \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* sea quiet, \w and|strong="H2022"\w* puts \w an|strong="H3559"\w* end \w to|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* sound \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w its|strong="H3559"\w* waves.

Those \w in|strong="H3220"\w* \w the|strong="H3220"\w* farthest parts \w of|strong="H1995"\w* \w the|strong="H3220"\w* earth \w have|strong="H1530"\w* fear when they see your signs: \w the|strong="H3220"\w* outgoings \w of|strong="H1995"\w* \w the|strong="H3220"\w* morning \w and|strong="H3220"\w* evening \w are|strong="H1995"\w* glad because \w of|strong="H1995"\w* you.

\w You|strong="H1242"\w* have given \w your|strong="H3427"\w* blessing \w to|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3372"\w* earth, watering \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w and|strong="H1242"\w* making \w it|strong="H1242"\w* fertile; \w the|strong="H3372"\w* river \w of|strong="H3427"\w* God \w is|strong="H3427"\w* full \w of|strong="H3427"\w* water: \w and|strong="H1242"\w* having made \w it|strong="H1242"\w* ready, \w you|strong="H1242"\w* give men grain.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ploughed \w lands|strong="H0776"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* smooth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* slopes: \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* soft \w with|strong="H4390"\w* showers, sending \w your|strong="H3588"\w* blessing \w on|strong="H0776"\w* \w its|strong="H6485"\w* growth.

\w The|strong="H1288"\w* year \w is|strong="H1288"\w* crowned \w with|strong="H7301"\w* \w the|strong="H1288"\w* good \w you|strong="H1288"\w* give; life-giving rain \w is|strong="H1288"\w* dropping from \w your|strong="H1288"\w* footsteps,

Falling on \w the|strong="H8141"\w* grass \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* waste land: \w and|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H8141"\w* little hills \w are|strong="H1880"\w* glad on \w every|strong="H8141"\w* side.
The grass-land is thick \w with|strong="H2296"\w* flocks; the valleys are full \w of|strong="H1389"\w* grain; they give glad cries \w and|strong="H1389"\w* songs \w of|strong="H1389"\w* joy.
